name: hugo-site
description: This is the repository from which the [Hugo](https://gohugo.io)-generated version of [www.brycewray.com](https://www.brycewray.com/) is built.

scripts.dev:hugo: npm run install:hugo && exec-bin bin/hugo/hugo server --port 3000 --bind=0.0.0.0 --baseURL=http://192.168.254.10:3000 --panicOnWarning --disableFastRender --forceSyncStatic --gc
scripts.testbuild:hugo: npm run install:hugo && npm run dev:hugo -- --minify --environment=production
scripts.start: NODE_ENV=development npm-run-all clean clean:newcss style-exe:newcss --parallel dev:hugo style-dev:newcss
scripts.build:prelim: NODE_ENV=production npm-run-all clean clean:newcss style-exe:newcss style-prod:newcss prod:hugo
scripts.testbuild: NODE_ENV=production npm-run-all clean clean:newcss style-exe:newcss --parallel testbuild:hugo style-testbuild:newcss
scripts.testbuildpf: NODE_ENV=production npm-run-all clean clean:newcss style-exe:newcss build:prelim dev:search --parallel testbuild:hugo style-testbuild:newcss

author: Bryce Wray
